Description: find mug and put it under coffeemachine and turn on the machine to dispense coffee

Slice the bread with a knife then put it into a toaster then it is toasted
Break the egg , and cook it on the pan over stove
Slice the tomato , and add water into the pot, and put the tomato in and boil it
add water into pot over the faucet and the put lettuce into it.
add water into pot, put the pot onto stove and on it
Find the cracked egg and throw it into bin
remove everything from the fridge and put it on the countertop
Slice potato, put potato in bowl. Put bowl in microwave and cook it
Open wine, find a cup, pour drink into cup
Find both fruits, Put fruits in a bowl. Put bowl in fridge
Grab cup from the pantry. Put cup under the sink and put cold water into cup
Find a pot. Fill out with water. Put potatoes in pot and boil them.
Find the slices on the table. Put the slices in a paper towel. Put paper towel in trash

Task: Pour away coffee in a cup_20_8
Description: Find the cup of coffee, pour the coffee in the sink and wash it away
Pour the pot of water into the sink
Slightly click the light to turn off the light
Go to the long table and pick up the laptop. Sit on the couch with the laptop on your lap. Use the laptop.
Find the remote. Use the remote to turn on the television.

Task: Check the timing on the watch_201_8
Description: Locate watch. Pick up watch. Check watch for timing.
Find everything that can be pack into the box, then close it.
Look inside tissue box to confirm it is empty. Lift box and walk to bin. Release box over bin to throw box away.

Task: Turn off the table lamp or desk lamp_218_8
Description: Walk over to desk lamp, turn off if on.
Throw cellphone at chair.
Grab the phone and switch it on
